name: League of Legends
description: Uses a 3rd party build of Wine shipped in an AppImage container. This build of Wine has not been audited for security purposes and is not hosted on our servers.
notes:
If you have issues with edge scrolling, try setting League to borderless mode instead of fullscreen.

This build is unstable on Arch and broken on Manjaro. If you are on an Arch-based distribution, it is suggested to use the following guide instead: https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflinux/comments/bx0y2s/success_latest_arch_linux_winelol_patch_911/
content:
custom-name: League of Legends (AppImage-wine runner)
files:
- lol_installer: https://riotgamespatcher-a.akamaihd.net/releases/live/installer/deploy/League%20of%20Legends%20installer%20NA.exe
- appimage_ci: https://github.com/mmtrt/Wine_Appimage/releases/download/continuous/wine-staging-i386_lol-patched_x86_64-bionic.AppImage
- dx2010: https://lutris.net/files/tools/directx-2010.tar.gz
game:
  args: wine "$GAMEDIR/drive_c/Riot Games/League of Legends/LeagueClient.exe"
  exe: $GAMEDIR/wine-staging-i386_lol-patched_x86_64-bionic.AppImage
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/dxsetup
    file: dx2010
- chmodx: appimage_ci
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: appimage_ci
- execute:
    args: wine wineboot
    description: Setting up wine prefix
    env:
      WINEARCH: win32
      WINEPREFIX: $GAMEDIR
    file: $GAMEDIR/wine-staging-i386_lol-patched_x86_64-bionic.AppImage
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose the game''s language:'
    id: LOCALE
    options:
    - cs_CZ: "\u010Ce\u0161tina"
    - en_AU: English AUS
    - en_GB: English U.K.
    - en_US: English U.S.
    - fr_FR: "Fran\xE7ais"
    - de_DE: Deutsch
    - es_ES: "Espa\xF1ol"
    - es_MX: "Espa\xF1ol Mexicano"
    - it_IT: Italiano
    - ja_JP: "\u65E5\u672C\u8A9E"
    - hu_HU: Magyar
    - pl_PL: Polski
    - pt_BR: "Portugu\xEAs do Brasil"
    - ro_RO: Romanian
    - ru_RU: "\u0440\u0443\u0441\u0441\u043A\u0438\u0439"
    - tr_TR: "T\xFCrk\xE7e"
    preselect: en_US
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose the game''s server region:'
    id: REGION
    options:
    - BR: Brazil
    - EUNE: Europe Nordic & East
    - EUW: Europe West
    - LAN: Latin America North
    - LAS: Latin America South
    - NA: North America
    - OCE: Oceania
    - RU: Russia
    - TR: Turkey
    - JP: Japan
    - SEA: South East Asia
    preselect: NA
- execute:
    args: wine $CACHE/dxsetup/DXSETUP.exe /silent
    description: Installing Directx9
    env:
      WINEPREFIX: $GAMEDIR
    file: $GAMEDIR/wine-staging-i386_lol-patched_x86_64-bionic.AppImage
- execute:
    args: wine lol_installer --mode unattended
    description: Installing League of Legends
    env:
      WINEDLLOVERRIDES: winemenubuilder.exe=d
      WINEPREFIX: $GAMEDIR
    file: $GAMEDIR/wine-staging-i386_lol-patched_x86_64-bionic.AppImage
- write_file:
    content: "install:\n    globals:\n        locale: \"$INPUT_LOCALE\"\n        region:\
      \ \"$INPUT_REGION\"\n"
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Riot Games/League of Legends/Config/LeagueClientSettings.yaml
require-binaries: wine
system:
  env:
    WINEARCH: win32
    WINEDEBUG: -all
    WINEDLLOVERRIDES: winemenubuilder.exe=d
    WINEOVERRIDES: msvcp140=native
    WINEPREFIX: $GAMEDIR
